name: fileDataRepresentation(withReplacementMetadata:replacementEmbeddedThumbnailPhotoFormat:replacementEmbeddedThumbnailPixelBuffer:replacementDepthData:)
desc: Generates and returns a flat data representation of the photo using the specified replacements for some or all of its attachments.
declaration:
func fileDataRepresentation(withReplacementMetadata replacementMetadata: [String : Any]?, 
replacementEmbeddedThumbnailPhotoFormat: [String : Any]?, 
replacementEmbeddedThumbnailPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer?, 
       replacementDepthData: AVDepthData?) -> Data?
